column1: The location is for a rain gauge shown on the old OS maps close to Coppice Stile House and at the correct elevation
There are notes saying the gauge is over exposed and that the readings are 6 inches too low in some cases
The June 1907, Jan 1910, Mar 1913, Sep 1921 and May 1955 readings are noted as being estimated therefore those readings and the associated annual totals have been removed from this record
